revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Tin Tower |image = [[File:Tin Tower.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Tin Tower. |tokens = 4,500 |location = Northeast of Ecruteak City. }} '''Tin Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 88,500 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || colspan=2 rowspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate || rowspan=2|<center>380,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Haunter.png|40px]] Haunter |- | [[File:Ho-Oh.png|40px]] '''Ho-Oh*''' || <center>1,410,000 |} '''Note: Must have captured Suicune, Raikou, and Entei'''
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | {{Bag2|XClick}} || 4 || 49.49% || 49.09% || 46.01% || rowspan=9|<center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || 4 || 49.49% || 49.09% || 46.01% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || 2 || 0.22% || 0.31% || 1.35% |- | {{Bag2|Spooky Plate}} || 2 || 0.22% || 0.31% || 1.35% |- | {{Bag2|Flame Plate}} || 2 || 0.22% || 0.31% || 1.35% |- | {{Bag2|Sky Plate}} || 2 || 0.22% || 0.31% || 1.35% |- | {{Bag2|Medium Restore}} || 1.75 || 0.11% || 0.27% || 1.24 |- | {{Bag2|Fire Egg}} || 1 || 0.016% || 0.19% || 0.90% |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || 0 || 0.0020% || 0.10% || 0.45% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
